mapper.select: SELECT vehicle_browsing_history.id, vehicle_browsing_history.vehicleId, vehicle_browsing_history.browseTime, vehicle.name as vehicleName, vehicle_brand.id as brandId, vehicle_brand.name as brandName, vehicle_model.id as modelId, vehicle_model.name as modelName, vehicle_type_dict.id as vehicleTypeId, vehicle_type_dict.typeName as vehicleTypeName, energy_type_dict.id as energyTypeId, energy_type_dict.typeName as energyTypeName, vehicle.productionYear, vehicle.dailyPrice, vehicle.seatCount, vehicle.status, vehicle.imageUrl, vehicle.description FROM vehicle_browsing_history INNER JOIN vehicle ON vehicle_browsing_history.vehicleId = vehicle.id AND vehicle.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN vehicle_brand ON vehicle.brandId = vehicle_brand.id AND vehicle_brand.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN vehicle_model ON vehicle.modelId = vehicle_model.id AND vehicle_model.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN vehicle_type_detail ON vehicle.vehicleTypeId = vehicle_type_detail.id AND vehicle_type_detail.isDelete = 0 INNER JOIN energy_type_detail ON vehicle.energyTypeId = energy_type_detail.id ANd energy_type_detail.isDelete = 0 WHERE vehicle_browsing_history.userId = #{userId} AND vehicle_browsing_history.isDelete = 0 ORDER BY vehicle_browsing_history.browseTime DESC
